Rental Agreement

1. Parties

This rental agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into on June 15th, 2023, by and between:

3. Term

The term of this Agreement shall be one year, commencing on July 1st, 2023, and ending on June 30th, 2024.

4. Rent

The Tenant shall pay rent of 1075 Euro per month, in advance, on the first day of each month. The rent includes all utilities, such as electricity, water, and heating.

5. Security Deposit

The Tenant shall pay a security deposit of 1075 Euro, which is equal to one month's rent, to the Landlord. The security deposit shall be refundable at the end of the lease, provided there are no damages or unpaid rent.

6. Use of Property

The Tenant shall use the Property for residential purposes only. The Tenant shall not sublease, assign, or transfer this Agreement, or allow any other person to occupy the Property without the Landlord's prior written consent.

7. Maintenance and Repairs

The Landlord shall be responsible for maintaining the Property and making any necessary repairs. The Tenant shall report any damages or needed repairs to the Landlord in writing within 5 days of occurrence.

8. Termination

Either party may terminate this Agreement upon 30 days' written notice to the other party.

9. Governing Law

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Germany.

10. Entire Agreement

This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes all prior negotiations, understandings, and agreements, whether written or oral, relating to the rental of the Property.
